News.Title: MVK Agro Gets Govt Nod to Boost Sugarcane Capacity
News.Summary: MVK Agro Food Product receives Industrial Enterprises Memorandum approval to increase sugarcane crushing capacity from 2,500 TCD to 4,000 TCD and molasses capacity from 16,800 to 26,880 metric tonnes annually.

News.Title: MVK Agro Food Product Signs Biogas Deal with MNGI, GAIL
News.Summary: MVK Agro Food Product has entered into a strategic agreement with MNGI and GAIL for biogas delivery, marking a significant step in the renewable energy sector.
